xwikidoc.name: SavedListSuggest
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set($ok = $response.setContentType("text/xml")) #set($input = $request.get("input").toLowerCase()) #set($sql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.SavedListClass' and lower(doc.title) like '%${input}%' order by doc.date desc") #set($queryResult = $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql, 30, 0)) #set($results = $queryResult.toArray()) <results type="8"> #foreach($res in $results) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="$res">$xwiki.getXMLEncoded($xwiki.getDocument($res).getDisplayTitle())</rs> #end </results> {{/velocity}}
